articles.title: NASA Lucy spacecraft captures FIRST photos of its target, Jupiter trojan asteroids; Know what's next - HT Tech
articles.description: The NASA Lucy spacecraft is headed for the Jupiter trojan asteroids. This is the first time it was able to capture photos of its targets which are located at three times the distance between Earth and the Sun.
